frame.name: Erasing
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> or <fen>Cause</fen> removes a piece of <fen>Information</fen> from a <fen>Document</fen> such that it cannot be retrieved.
<ex><fex name="Agent">I</fex> <t>deleted</t> <fex name="Information">the last line</fex> <fex name="Document">from my essay</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Information
FE.definition: <def-root>The thing that the <fen>Agent</fen> removes from the <fen>Document</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Document
FE.definition: <def-root>The collection of pieces of information from which the specific <fen>Information</fen> is removed.</def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>The way in which the <fen>Agent</fen> or <fen>Cause</fen> removes the <fen>Information</fen> from the <fen>Document</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The time when the <fen>Agent</fen> or <fen>Cause</fen> removes the <fen>Information</fen> from the <fen>Document</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>The location in which the <fen>Agent</fen> or <fen>Cause</fen> removes the <fen>Information</fen> from the <fen>Document</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition: <def-root>The means by which the <fen>Agent</fen> or <fen>Cause</fen> removes the <fen>Information</fen> from the <fen>Document</fen>.</def-root>
